plot: This is a story about the European Union - a parody after The Tale of Tales by John Branch. It is adapted after a folklore tale, by an unknown author.
title: The Tale of E.U. Generousity
plot_es: This is a story about the European Union - a parody after The Tale of Tales by John Branch. It is adapted after a folklore tale, by an unknown author.
